title: On boundary conditions for linearised Einstein's equations
authors: Matteo Capoferri, Simone Murro and Gabriel Schmid
abstract:
We investigate the properties of a fairly large class of boundary conditions
for the linearised Einstein equations in the Riemannian setting, ones which
generalise the linearised counterpart of boundary conditions proposed by
Anderson. Through the prism of the quest to quantise gravitational waves in
curved spacetimes, we study their properties from the point of view of
ellipticity, gauge invariance, and the existence of a spectral gap.
